title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.2 - Number and person
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.2 - Number and person

State Regulations
(a) Singular words may be interchanged with the plural as required by
context. (b) The word "person"
shall include an individual, corporation, partnership, unincorporated
association, governmental body or any other legal entity, as context may
require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.2

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
